title: Amazfit GTR Mini Smart Watch 43mm, 14-Day Battery Life, GPS, AI Fitness App Enabled, Heart Rate & Sleep Health Monitoring, Activity Trackers and Smartwatches, Android iPhone Compatible, Black
description: This smart watch for iPhone and Android compatible users offers simple integration, helping your device work effortlessly with Apple and Android systems. The GTR Mini smartwatches are expertly crafted to support your fitness journey, equipped with GPS technology for accurate route tracking and a step counter for walking. Embrace the freedom of its extraordinary 14-day battery life, allowing you to stay active without frequent charges. Engineered with over 120 sports modes, this fitness watch adapts to your unique workout regime, offering smart recognition for selected activities. Whether you are cycling through the city or engaging in a high-energy workout, this smart watch Android & iPhone compatible device keeps pace with your lifestyle. By leveraging Amazfit's advanced health monitoring capabilities, this fit watch delivers insights into heart rate, SpO₂, and stress levels around the clock, providing vital health information at your fingertips. As a water-resistant health watch, with 5 ATM water resistance, it stands up under pressure, perfect for swimming and various aquatic sports. Although it does not support Bluetooth phone calls, it ensures you stay connected with call notifications and quick SMS replies on Android devices. Designed as a high-performance companion, the Amazfit GTR Mini smart watch exemplifies technology to elevate your daily activities.
